text:
The manual describes xml configuration solely in terms of the deprecated DOMConfigurator. If that has been replaced with the joranconfigurator, the manual needs some minor updates.

It would also be nice if the manual gave an example xml configuration file.
creator: mikebk@knology.net

text:
DOMConfigurator was marked as deprecated in log4j 1.3 development effort in favor of JoranConfigurator.  
However as log4j 1.3 has been abandoned, the deprecation warning is no longer significant.
creator: carnold@apache.org
